metadata.Title: CVE-2023-27985 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: emacsclient-mail.desktop in Emacs 28.1 through 28.2 is vulnerable to shell command injections through a crafted mailto: URI. This is related to lack of compliance with the Desktop Entry Specification. It is fixed in 29.0.90

criterions.comment: xemacs21: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xemacs21-packages: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
